sentenceEnglish: I go to sleep after the movie.
I meet a friend in the afternoon.
The airplane is flying over the city.

sentenceHebrew: האופה מכין לחם טרי כל יום.
sentenceTransliteration: Ha-ofe mechin lechem tari kol yom.
sentenceEnglish: The baker prepares fresh bread every day.
The child gets into the bathtub.
The boy is riding a bicycle.

sentenceHebrew: ארוחת הבוקר שלי היא לחם עם גבינה.
sentenceTransliteration: Aruħát ha-bóker shelí hi léħem im gviná.
sentenceEnglish: My breakfast is bread with cheese.
I want ice cream, but there is none.
My clothes are in the closet.
There is a lot of dust in this room.

sentenceTransliteration: Healthy eating is important for health.

sentenceEnglish: I sent you an email yesterday.

sentenceHebrew: יש לי חמש אצבעות בכל יד.
sentenceTransliteration: Yesh li ħamésh etzba’ót be-kol yad.
sentenceEnglish: I have five fingers on each hand.
There are white geese in the lake.
The guest arrived early to the party.
The event will take place in a large hall.

sentenceHebrew: אם יורד גשם, אני נשאר בבית.
sentenceTransliteration: Im yoréd gésem, aní nish’ár ba-báyit.
sentenceEnglish: If it rains, I'm staying at home.
I'm looking for information about the city.
I use the internet every day.
They went on vacation to a small island.
He's eating Italian food at the restaurant.
I write a letter on the paper.
There is light in the room.
This book is very dear to me.

sentenceHebrew: ארוחת הצהריים שלי היא אורז עם עוף.
sentenceTransliteration: Aruħát ha-tsohoráyim shelí hi órez im óf.
sentenceEnglish: My lunch is rice with chicken.
I eat three meals a day.
My mother works at a hospital.
He has a new and fast motorcycle.
Do you want tea or coffee?
A person is walking on the street.
I'm waiting for a sign from you.
The internet in my house is very slow.

sentenceHebrew: הוא היה עייף, אז הוא ישן.
sentenceTransliteration: Hu haya ayef, az hu yashan.
sentenceEnglish: He was tired, so he slept.
There is a big stone in the garden.
There is no milk in the fridge.
There are a thousand people in the city.
I study at a university in Jerusalem.
